item.description:
Hello Fellow Portuguese Meet-Uppers,

Since some of you were sad to have missed Sammy's dance Meet-up, he decided to offer another one, also free of charge.

The goal is to introduce“Forró and Samba no Pé” dance steps.

To practice your Portuguese skills, he plans to conduct the class in Portuguese, and if necessary, he will translate instructions into English.

When: Saturday, June 20, 2009
Time: At 4 p.m.
Studio: # 1
Location: The Dance Complex (www.dancecomplex.org)
536 Massachusetts Ave.
Cambridge, MA - 02139
Phone: 617.547.9363

(www.samray.com)

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: 2ND BRAZILIAN DANCE FREESTYLE with Sam Ray ***FREE***
